tool_description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying the legitimacy of your merchants by using their import export certification. 

With the Import Export verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants knowing that they are a genuine entity, registered under the Registrar of Companies, and are authorized to partake in the import and export of products.
title: Import Export Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Import Export Verification
api_list.description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying the legitimacy of your merchants by using their import export certification. 

With the Import Export verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants knowing that they are a genuine entity, registered under the Registrar of Companies, and are authorized to partake in the import and export of products.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://import-export-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/roc_iec"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "import-export-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://import-export-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/roc_iec"
